TextBody:
Hello David,

Thank you for contacting the Endpoint Protector support team.

We do have the hotfixes ready and available.  Since you are already on Endpoint Protector Server version 5.9.3.0, the security patch is also available via live update.  To apply the patch via live update, please navigate to "Dashboard" > "Live Update" and then click on "Check Now".  The hotfix should appear as listed in the below screenshot.





The vulnerability has two components:
1. Server
2. Client

Please use the below download links to download the hot-fixes.

1. Server:
You can get the hotfix via live update as mentioned above.

2. Client:

MacOS:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPMac3.0.2.2005.Notarized.tar

Windows:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_v6.2.2.2005.zip

Linux:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_ubuntu_22.04_v2.4.2.1007_x86_64.tar.gz
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_ubuntu_20.04_v2.4.2.1007_x86_64.tar.gz
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_ubuntu_18.04_v2.4.2.1007_x86_64.tar.gz
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_rhel_9.4_v2.4.2.1007_x86_64.tar.gz
https://download.endpointprotector.com/linux_agent/EppClientVulnerability/EPPClient_rhel_8.10_v2.4.2.1007_x86_64.tar.gz


I hope this information helps, if you have any concerns or follow up questions then please do let us know.


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CQ42j:ref

Hello André,

Thank you for your fast answer.

I tried to do the installation, the installation works and also says "Patch was installed successfully".
But when i do the "Check updates", it shows up again.

[cid:image001.png@01DACB8C.BA373090]


Eventhough it says "Update installed: 01. July 2024" I am not sure i fit actually is installed.

Kind regards,
David

Von: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Gesendet: Freitag, 28. Juni 2024 14:35

TextBody:
Hello David,
 
Thank you for the update.

We are aware of the hotfix update that appears in the list of "Available EPP Software Updates" after it was already applied and it still appears in the list after a Server reboot.  We are currently investigating this issue and will notify you the moment we have found a resolution.

Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
